database.name: VIEW ALMAC_CRM_CLIENTE
database.view: SELECT c_bpartner.c_bpartner_id AS almac_crm_cliente_id, c_bpartner.ad_client_id, c_bpartner.ad_org_id, c_bpartner.isactive, c_bpartner.created, c_bpartner.createdby, c_bpartner.updated, c_bpartner.updatedby, c_bpartner.value AS identificador, c_bpartner.name FROM c_bpartner WHERE c_bpartner.ad_client_id = '0BD13E24E0F94596B61414BD72225EB8' AND c_bpartner.iscustomer = 'Y'
